original_text: therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: I am about to stretch out my hand against the Philistines, and I will wipe out the Kerethites and destroy those remaining along the coast.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 내가 블레셋 사람 위에 손을 펴서 그렛 사람을 끊으며 해변에 남은 자를 진멸하되

sentences.original_text: therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says:
I am about to stretch out my hand against the Philistines,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 블레셋 사람들을 향해 내 손을 뻗으려 하고 있으며,

sentences.original_text: and I will wipe out the Kerethites
and destroy those remaining along the coast.
